actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize the Law Enforcement Assistance Administration to make grants to carry out local programs to prevent community crime and to improve relations between residents and personnel of law enforcement agencies.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize the Law Enforcement Assistance Administration to make grants to prevent community crime and promote better relations between residents and law enforcement personnel, including programs providing escort services for the elderly, home protection guides, property identification, block watch, police-neighborhood councils, and advisory councils on community-based corrections.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize the Law Enforcement Assistance Administration to make grants to carry out local programs to prevent community crime and to improve relations between residents and personnel of law enforcement agencies.
